channel.title: What Makes A Good Server?
channel.description:
[center][size=14pt][b]~~ What Makes A Great Server ~~[/b][/size] [i]Yes, I can post this here, I am using it to make a server people will actually join - although I might keep RTH...[/i]
[u]This Topic Will Be Used For:[/u]
[ul][li]Finding out what makes a great server like ZDiddyScape or PK Isle.[/li] [li]For other supreme coders to find out what as well.[/li] [li]Server players to voice their opinions.[/li][/ul]
[u]Also, please, owners, post ideas as well if your server is jumpin'...[/u]
[i]Please post/voice ideas and opinions for me, my server, other coders and their servers too.
I will use this survey as help on my way to coding a better server...[/i]
[b]Keep Other Worn Out And Tired Coders' Servers And Hopes Alive By Posting![/b][/center]

item.title: What Makes A Good Server?
item.dc:creator: @Newb_2341 Newb 2341
item.description:
@Newb_2341 wrote:

Any more other then XP, money and - camels.

Read full topic

item.title: What Makes A Good Server?
item.dc:creator: @Mikeey Mikeey
item.description:
@Mikeey wrote:

dbzmaster555:

A good server would be a balanced experince point training not like making the exp so low it pisses people off. and you need to have a good buzz about it like something other servers don’t have. Also don’t just add tuts try to make up your own code.

Good point, About xp but i think that a good server is somthing that noone has ever done and maby put in a new stat or somthing in it if your thinking of making a server or you have one and are looking for ideas but just go over the top with a server and if the people dont like it that are playing then you can change it just use your imagination on a server then it gets to be really fun.

Read full topic

item.title: What Makes A Good Server?
item.dc:creator: @getsome getsome
item.description:
@getsome wrote:

[quote=“Casey., post:1, topic:91556”]camel masks.[/quote]lol il add that to my sarcophagus hunting minigame reward list

ive bothered whit this question to,and the anser is quite simple

as long as a player can play whitout LAG,DISCONECTS,RESSETS and ROLL-BACKS you server will have peeps on it

one,s you have stuff nobody has lots of peeps wll be on ure server its as simple as that

important!!! Tell you people how tomake money if thej dont now how thej get boredand leave

Read full topic

item.title: What Makes A Good Server?
item.dc:creator: @slay_blad3 slay blad3
item.description:
@slay_blad3 wrote:

Updates daily, friendly staff, UNIQUE updates, I also added a bufferwriting ::suggest command so players could voice themselves. Before I update, I do a mass vote to see what users think instead of just me.

Read full topic

item.title: What Makes A Good Server?
item.dc:creator: @dbzmaster555 dbzmaster
item.description:
@dbzmaster555 wrote:

A good server would be a balanced experince point training not like making the exp so low it pisses people off. and you need to have a good buzz about it like something other servers don’t have. Also don’t just add tuts try to make up your own code.

Read full topic

item.description:
@nub_pwner wrote:

a great server is something that people like and has never been done before

Read full topic

item.title: What Makes A Good Server?
item.dc:creator: @Newb_2341 Newb 2341
item.description:
@Newb_2341 wrote:

[center][size=14pt]~~ What Makes A Great Server ~~[/size]
Yes, I can post this here, I am using it to make a server people will actually join - although I might keep RTH…

This Topic Will Be Used For:

[ul][li]Finding out what makes a great server like ZDiddyScape or PK Isle.[/li]
[li]For other supreme coders to find out what as well.[/li]
[li]Server players to voice their opinions.[/li][/ul]

Also, please, owners, post ideas as well if your server is jumpin’…

[i]Please post/voice ideas and opinions for me, my server, other coders and their servers too.

I will use this survey as help on my way to coding a better server…[/i]

Keep Other Worn Out And Tired Coders’ Servers And Hopes Alive By Posting![/center]

Read full topic
